name: Gloomy Village
description:
Gloomy Village is an erotic adventure with elements of survival.

You are in the role of a big-breasted treasure hunter and adventurer - Evelyn. Having found a hidden passage to the catacombs, you have to get into a settlement stuffed with fanatics, undead and nonhumans in order to defeat a sorceress in a leather jacket and find an ancient treasure.

While surviving, you will need to clean up the settlement, fight vile and vulgar entities, free captive slaves, and collect items for survival and collectibles.

In case of a shortage of ammo or first-aid kits, you can always visit the nameless merchant in the churches. Among other things - in her assortment you can find sexy outfits and other useful things.
